DataElement.preferredName: Cervical Cancer AJCC Edition 8 Clinical Regional Lymph Node N Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the regional lymph node involvement for cervical carcinoma based on evidence obtained from the date of cancer diagnosis until the start of definitive treatment, or within four months (whichever is shorter), using AJCC Ed. 8 criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to clinical N stage of a cervical tumor (or cancer of the uterine cervix).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Relating to a neck, or cervix, in any sense.:(NEE-o-PLAY-zha) Abnormal and uncontrolled cell growth.

Concepts.definition: Relating to a neck, or cervix, in any sense.

A benign or malignant tissue growth resulting from uncontrolled cell proliferation. Benign neoplastic cells resemble normal cells without exhibiting significant cytologic atypia, while malignant cells exhibit overt signs such as dysplastic features, atypical mitotic figures, necrosis, nuclear pleomorphism, and anaplasia. Representative examples of benign neoplasms include papillomas, cystadenomas, and lipomas; malignant neoplasms include carcinomas, sarcomas, lymphomas, and leukemias.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients.:One criteria of the TMN staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/10/17 tt Transferred ownership/BC and changed Reg Status. Changed to use Property based on NCIt concept for N Stage

ValueDomain.preferredName: Cervical Carcinoma American Joint Committee on Cancer Edition 8 N Category
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A finding about one or more characteristics of cervical cancer, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v8 classification system._A group formed for the purpose of developing a system of clinical staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications._One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cervical Cancer pN1 TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cervical Cancer pN1 TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Cervical cancer with regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Cervical Cancer pN1 TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Cervical cancer with regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cervical Cancer pN0(i+) TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cervical Cancer pN0(i+) TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Cervical cancer with isolated tumor cells in regional lymph node(s) no greater than 0.2 mm. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Cervical Cancer pN0(i+) TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Cervical cancer with isolated tumor cells in regional lymph node(s) no greater than 0.2 mm. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cervical Cancer pN0 TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cervical Cancer pN0 TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Cervical cancer with no regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Cervical Cancer pN0 TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Cervical cancer with no regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cervical Cancer pNX TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cervical Cancer pNX TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Cervical cancer in which the regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Cervical Cancer pNX TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Cervical cancer in which the regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)
